p: The analysis of Zataria multiflora essential oil with GC-FID and GC-mass spectrometry (MS) identified 29 compounds which accounted for 99.6% of the total essential oil composition ( Table 1). It contained thymol (52.90%), p-cymene (9.10), Î³-terpinene (8.10%) and carvacrol (6.80%) as major constituents ( Figure 1).
